title: Login Status
body: Anyone else having to wait in a que to login? My estimated wait time has jumped from 10 minutes to 30 minutes. :(

replies.body:
We experienced a login service issue that has now been resolved. You should be able to log in now and CHAAAAAAAAAAARGE into some matches with Kled. 

Let me know if you have any questions.

I cant even get past the LOL logo, let alone the launch screen, 

great job Riot, it would help to have some communication 

search for "riot compensation for downed server" and spread the word
Wow. My timer went from 56 minutes to 1 hour and 22 minutes. Wtf is this shit
Just tried restarting the application and now it says unavailable to launch..... Gj riot
Welcome to the club. I think its constantly expanding.
And now it is just down. I guess the patch is soon?
Patch already happened - this is an issue on their end
I was talking about the issue at hand. its obviously gonna be some kinda micro patch following right? Sorry for not clarifying.
Oh yeah I have to assume so - unless the issues with their own servers and not the client. Either way I'm hoping for a fix soon, today was one of the few days i could play >.>

Wow the 20000 number is rapidly decreasing and my login time is 5 minutes.

http://prntscr.com/c3z3vs

Edit: I'm logged in, but Ranked is gone?
Count yourself lucky you are not in this position http://prntscr.com/c3z1wg
Mine is at 51 minutes, and climbed to 54....
My login que is doing the same thing. Went from 30min to 40min. I think i just have to settle for another game till this is fixed.
with the game being as old as it is and the team being as experienced as they are, there's really no excuse for these kinds of login issues 6 years in.
also no ranked queue, but i dont see a notice about it...
Yeah, Riot is trying to fix it.

Mine climbed from 50 minutes to 1 hour 15, when I canceled and tried again, I got this:

The server is currently busy. Please try again later.

What kind of shit is this? I mean, millions of people play each hour, many login right? 20,000 loggin in at one time is no big deal, its probably a bug, well, it doesn't take two fucking hours to fix one tiny bug.
